simpplle.gui

Class ClimateDialogWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpplle.gui.ClimateDialogWrapper

  • public class ClimateDialogWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    The University of Montana owns copyright of the designated documentation contained within this file as part of the software product designated by Uniform Resource Identifier UM-OpenSIMPPLLE-1.0. By copying this file the user accepts the University of Montana Open Source License Contract pertaining to this documentation and agrees to abide by all restrictions, requirements, and assertions contained therein. All Other Rights Reserved.

    Description: At the time this class was designed JBuilder did not support the new features of Java 1.5. In the case of this class the variable currentSeason of type simpplle.comcode.Climate.Season which is an enum caused the designer problems. As a result this wrapper class was created so that the class that the designer manipulated will function in the designer. That classes event handlers simpler refer to this one. Note: Graphics are updated by updating ClimateDialog's graphics.

    • Method Detail

      • getDialog

        public ClimateDialog getDialog()
        Gets the climate dialog.
        Returns:
        the climate dialog.

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        Sets the current season to year, climate, temperature and moisture to defaults, and time step to 1 (meaning initial). Adds the temperature to combo boxes, moistures to combo boxes, and gets the climate and season at time step 1, sets the time step text to empty, if is wyoming, creates a separate set of combo boxes, then updates dialog.

      • updateDialog

        private void updateDialog()
        Gets the climate based on user current time step, season. If year combo box is not selected, enables the radiobuttons for seasons, if user climate exists allows user access to user only combo box, then enables previous, next, buttons, temperature, moisture combo boxes menu trop downs for save, close, delete current time steps, delete all time steps.

      • updateSeason

        private void updateSeason()
        Sets the selected radio button for season depending on current season

      • prevPB_actionPerformed

        void prevPB_actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        if user only climate is true and year combo box is selected, gets the previous user season based on the current time step and current season then sets current season to the previous, and updates dialog.
        Parameters:
        e - 'previous' button pushed

      • nextPB_actionPerformed

        void nextPB_actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        If next button is pushed, sets the current season to the next user season, which was calculated using current time and current season.
        Parameters:
        e - 'Next'

      • userOnlyCB_actionPerformed

        public void userOnlyCB_actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        If user Only combo box is selected, sets user only to true, gets the first step, and sets the current time to the first time step, unless that is -1 sets the current season to first time step season.
        Parameters:
        e -

      • timeStepEdit_actionPerformed

        void timeStepEdit_actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Gets the time step input in the time step text field, if input time step is < 1 or above maximum allowed throws an exception, sets the current time step to input time step, and updates Jdialog.
        Parameters:
        e - time step entered in text field

      • temperatureCB_actionPerformed

        void temperatureCB_actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        If temperature combo box, sets the temperature to current time, current season.
        Parameters:
        e - temperature combo box selected

      • moistureCB_actionPerformed

        void moistureCB_actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        If moisture combo box selected, creates moisture items, then sets the current moisture according to current time step, current season and input moisture.
        Parameters:
        e -

      • seasonChanged

        public void seasonChanged(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e,
                 Climate.Season season)
        Updates the current season to a specified season.
        Parameters:
        e -
        season - the season to be updated.

      • yearCB_actionPerformed

        public void yearCB_actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        If year Combo box is choosen, sets the moisture, temperature to current, the current season to year, if not selected... current season is set to spring.
        Parameters:
        e - combo box year item selected

      • userCB_actionPerformed

        public void userCB_actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        If user combo box is selected, sets the climate to current time and current season, else if current season is year removes all climates for current time, else removes seasons for both current time and current season.
        Parameters:
        e -

        Parameters:

      • menuFileSaveAs_actionPerformed

        void menuFileSaveAs_actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Does not use the current System knowledge climate file. Instead calls the saveFile() with file not specified.
        Parameters:
        e -

      • menuFileClose_actionPerformed

        void menuFileClose_actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        If menu item close choosen, prompts user to save changes if there is already a climate file, and the climate has changed. Resets the current time to 1 (initial), closes climate file, and changes current season to YEAR.
        Parameters:
        e -

      • menuFileQuit_actionPerformed

        void menuFileQuit_actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        If menu item Quit is choosen closes the dialog.
        Parameters:
        e - 'Quit'
